Docs.summary: Unifies enumerable, collection, and dictionary support that are useful for exposing a dictionary of names in a XAML namescope.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary> defines no members of its own. Instead, the interface inherits <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> generic interfaces, with <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.Object> (or a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair%602> thereof) as constraints. <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary> also inherits <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScopeDictionary> interface is used internally as a type for information passing, as part of object writer context for the WPF XAML implementation.
